file_content.text: There are fewer aliens on this planet now because of you. My great thanks.
Details, I want details. Don't spare a single image. Describe every morsel of destruction and death you visited upon the Jedi's alien pets.
It was a symphony of foreign tongues crying out.
I made them all scream.
Yes, yes! Delightful. My ears can almost hear it.
Not in the mood.
You leave me wanting, friend. I suppose I'll just have to use my imagination.
Aliens don't even die well.
It was unremarkable.
Too bad. But at least they did die.
You have ensured the Jedi will not gain an advantage here. The Empire is thankful.
There is no time to waste. Kill all the Force-sensitive aliens the Jedi are training, immediately.
Come here to me. I have something of great urgency to speak with you on.
I always have time for Sith.
Yes, my lord.
And I seldom have need of non-Sith.
Sounds intriguing.
Please hurry.
Because the issue is somewhat time sensitive, I will tolerate being prompted to rush.
I am Lord Sharoleigh. I have uncovered something that alarms and sickens me. The Jedi are recruiting and training Force-sensitive aliens.
All of them, inferior species. It's the thing I hate most about our enemy. They gladly enlist and promote non-humans.
I crush all other beings, no matter what species.
Everyone is inferior to me.
We are the epitome of purity and supremacy.
Should I be offended? Are you calling me inferior?
I am alien.
There are rare exceptions. The Empire allows only the most worthy of other species to join.
Your hatred of this practice is a source of great strength for you.
Let it feed you.
Let the Republic dilute their strength with less desirables.
Then it weakens them.
I suppose I ought to be grateful to the Jedi, then.
There are so many reasons to despise the Republic and the Jedi.
My hate runs deeper.
Quite right. So many reasons to desire their destruction.
What's so awful about recruiting aliens?
What's wrong with that?
You mustn't joke. Someone might think you're serious.
If these Force sensitives are allowed to complete their training, it will give the Jedi a numbers advantage here on Nar Shaddaa.
Sith would have to send more here to combat the alien Jedi, diluting our forces elsewhere. This is unacceptable. They must all be killed.
I'll gladly sign up.
I knew you were of good stock when I saw you.
Every last one.
I wish I could witness the massacre. It would delight these eyes.
Go to the Jedi training camp and slaughter every alien you see. Return to me and don't spare the details.
Not a chance. [Refuse quest.]
Is it possible we have a bleeding heart among us? When you come to understand, come back to see me.
I beckon to you, Sith. I've come into information of particular importance to our kind.
I always have time for a fellow Sith.
Yes, my lord?
You must be your master's pride.
I could hate Sith as much as I hate everyone else.
You presume much.
You ought to be a bit more discerning with your venom.
Will you enlist my fellows as well?
What about my friends?
Certainly. The larger the cleanup crew the better.
I'm in a hurry.
I might have some interest in this as well.
Sith concerns concern me.
Might you? Then pay attention and try not to interrupt me.
Ignore me, I'm just naturally nosy.
Mind if I eavesdrop?
If you travel with a Sith, you are certainly welcome.
I hope this won't take long.
Please make it quick.
So many aliens on this foul planet. It's enough to make me physically ill.
